amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify that nothing in the bill may be construed as prohibiting private pension plans from investing in domestic investments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 1 in the Congressional Record of September 8, 1995, to clarify that nothing in the bill may be construed as prohibiting private pension plans from investing in domestic investments.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 217 (Roll no. 649).
